nodes.text: The father of Fir Megsan was a male who served in the Republic Military during the Great Galactic War with the Sith Empire. In 3653 BBY, the man was present on the Republic capital of Coruscant when the Empire attacked the planet. During the fighting, Megsan's father was killed by the Sith Lord Praven, causing the young Megsan to set a bounty on the Sith Pureblood in an attempt to gain revenge.

Fir Megsan's father is mentioned in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, in a message to Jedi Knight players who chose to kill Praven for dark side points during their battle on Tatooine, instead of sparing him for light side points. Megsan explains Praven's role in their father's death, and thanks the player for fulfilling the bounty. However, as the Knight is assumed to be a light side character, Megsan's bounty is assumed to never have been fulfilled.
